p: A phase III clinical trial (ACTRN12619000764134) is ongoing to assess the safety and efficacy of povidone-iodine nasal spray (NasodineÂ®) in the treatment of subjects affected by common cold, potentially caused by human coronaviruses ( Firebrick Pharma Pty Ltd., 1261). PVP-I awaits clinical trial data confirming an effective activity of drug against SARS-CoV-2.
